about_the_game:
Join Plunko, a determined green ball with a sharp left hook, on an action-packed journey through the Roundlands. Under the peaceful reign of Lord Orb, life is carefree—friendly boxing matches keep the Roundlandians entertained. But when King Trungle from the Polygon Valley threatens this harmony, it’s up to Plunko to defend his homeland.

Master parkour challenges and fast-paced boxing battles to become the "Champion of the Roundlands." Along the way, supercharge your abilities with Roundlandian energy drinks, letting you blast through levels at breakneck speeds. Strategically use energized walls to maintain momentum, but be mindful of the clock!

With vibrant 2D pixel art, Plunko combines the charm of classic platformers with high-speed, skill-based gameplay. Navigate colorful worlds, confront tough enemies, and discover secrets to aid in your quest to stop King Trungle and protect the Roundlands.

Features:

  • A determined hero with a strong left hook and an unstoppable spirit.

  • Online or LAN PvP boxing matches in the peaceful Roundlands.

  • Challenging parkour and thrilling combat encounters.

  • Power up with energy drinks to gain invincibility and lightning-fast speed.

  • Explore a beautifully crafted pixel world inspired by classic platformer games.

  • Face off against King Trungle and his Polygonite army in the ultimate battle for the Roundlands.

Take on this exciting adventure and become the champion the Roundlands need. Ready to roll?

name: PLUNKO - Champion of the Roundlands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: PLUNKO - Champion of the Roundlands is a hand crafted action platformer with an energetic twist! You play as Plunko, and help him on his quest to stop King Trungle. Plunko loves energy drinks, give them one and prepare to bounce off the walls!
